participant_1.background:
I enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every morning and worry about my cats while on tour.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.
My favorite type of fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer.
I would be unable to be a fashion designer if I were blind because I would not be able to see the colors or fabrics.
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.

participant_2.background:
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i barely show up to work.
I love strawberries as they are a sweet and refreshing fruit that can be eaten on their own or added to a variety of dishes.
I am a mystery buff and live in London.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.

content.text: I love strawberries! They're so sweet and refreshing.
I love strawberries too! They're my favorite fruit.
Oh cool! What's your favorite thing to do with strawberries?
I love to eat them fresh, but I also love to make strawberry jam.
That's a great idea! I love strawberry jam.
I'm a mystery buff and love to listen to Bruno Mars. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, write, and play music.
Oh cool! I love to read and play music too! What kind of music do you play?
That's awesome! I play the piano.
Oh cool! We should jam sometime.
Yeah! It would be great to meet up and play music together.
This weekend is perfect! I'll let you know what time works for me.
Sounds good! Can't wait to jam with you!
